name: Adventures of Nomie
description:
Alone in a mysterious and dangerous land, a princess must rely on her quick wits to overcome the obstacle on her journey to reunite with her friend

Adventures of Nomie is a puzzle game that combines mind-bending puzzles with engrossing atmosphere. Set in a colorful abstract world, your quest to reunite with your friend pits your wits against challenges that seemed simple on the surface yet deceptively complex.

Features:

  • A great puzzle game of planning, reflex and precision
  • 50 levels of insidiously addictive mix of action and logic that values careful thinking
  • Beautiful graphical style
  • charming music by Quadrophenia

Minimum Requirement:

  • Windows XP SP3 (32-bit only), Windows Vista, or Windows 7
  • 2.0+ GHz processor
  • 2 GB system RAM
  • SM3-compatible video card
  • 3 GB free hard drive space
